title: [K-12] Professional Science Teaching Attitude (STA) Development Program for Prospective Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of the secondary science curriculum and foundational experience in teaching-learning processes
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based mobile learning environment emphasizing collaboration-focused project activities

learning_goals: Enhancing science lesson design capabilities by applying the 4C/ID model-based science process skills (SPS) pedagogy.
Reducing science teaching anxiety and improving science teaching self-efficacy by over 20%.
Operationalizing behavioral intentions to integrate science-related activities into lessons in a PBL environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
